value.title: StarCraft 2: LURKERS & NYDUS WORMS! (Rogue vs PartinG)
value.excerpt: An awesome game of Zerg versus Protoss in StarCraft 2 between the previous world champion Rogue and one of the strongest Protoss players PartinG. value.excerpt: A fun best-of-3 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral (Zerg) and GuMiho (Terran). At this point I am fairly certain that GuMiho plays a different strategy in every game he plays. In this best-of-3 series he decides to play Mech, cheesy Marines and a very strange Bio based opener.   Vanya
